      • FileResourceService

        public FileResourceService(java.lang.String dataLocation,
                           java.lang.String baseUrl,
                           CuratorFramework curator,
                           Producer<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> producer,
                           EventService notifications,
                           java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> idSupplier,
                           java.lang.Boolean async)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Create a File-based repository service
        Parameters:
        dataLocation - the data location
        baseUrl - the base url
        curator - the curator framework
        producer - the kafka producer
        notifications - the notification service
        idSupplier - an identifier supplier for new resources
        async - generate cached resources asynchronously if true, synchonously if false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the directory is not writable
